Two Diagrams

Diagram 1, Image

The diagram depicts the Windows XP System properties window, with the Automatic Updates tab selected. The Automatic (recommended) option radio button is selected, which automatically downloads available updates at a specified time (for example 3:00 AM), and installs them.

Other options include the following:
Download updates but let the user choose when to install them.
Notify the user when updates are available but do not automatically download and install them.
Turn off Automatic Updates.
